title: How to Make a Coffee Filter 'ExpoDisc'

steps.headline: Get the supplies from Things You'll Need.
Take your filter apart if you can.
steps.description: How to take it apart will depend on the type of lens you have. It may be too difficult to do without destroying it, which you don't want to do. You can still create the tool, even if you don't have the ability to take it apart.

steps.headline: Cut a circle out of the coffee filter that fits the size filter that you have.
If you have managed to take the filter apart, put the cut out circle on top of the glass and reassemble the filter.
steps.description: If you haven't, cut the circle so that it fits inside the filter casing tightly.

tyn: A clear glass filter for the lens you are making it for
